Serialized Form

  • Package com.pacman.model

    • Class com.pacman.model.Collectable extends java.awt.Rectangle implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • posX
          int posX
          Position X in GRID not in pixels
        • posY
          int posY
          Position Y in GRID not in pixels
        • type
          Collectable.Type type

    • Class com.pacman.model.Ghost extends java.awt.Rectangle implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • color
          java.awt.Color color
          Color of displayed ghost
        • dir
          Ghost.Direction dir
        • movementSpeedX
          double movementSpeedX
          Vertical Movement speed in pixels per second [px/s] Horizontal and Vertical speed may differ because of window resizing, User can resize the window not into a square shape
        • movementSpeedY
          double movementSpeedY
          Horizontal Movement speed in pixels per second [px/s] Horizontal and Vertical speed may differ because of window resizing, User can resize the window not into a square shape
        • posX
          double posX
          Position X
        • posXprev
          double posXprev
          Last position X where ghost changed dir
        • posY
          double posY
          Position Y
        • posYprev
          double posYprev
          Last position Y where ghost changed dir
        • random
          java.util.Random random
          Random generator for generating direction

    • Class com.pacman.model.Player extends java.awt.Rectangle implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • movementSpeedX
          double movementSpeedX
          Vertical Movement speed in pixels per second [px/s] Horizontal and Vertical speed may differ because of window resizing, User can resize the window not into a square shape
        • movementSpeedY
          double movementSpeedY
          Horizontal Movement speed in pixels per second [px/s] Horizontal and Vertical speed may differ because of window resizing, User can resize the window not into a square shape
        • movementX
          int movementX
          Possible values are -1,0,1: {0 - player does not move horizontally, -1 - player moves left, 1 - player moves right}
        • movementY
          int movementY
          Possible values are -1,0,1: {0 - player does not move vertically, -1 - player moves up, 1 - player moves down}
        • posX
          double posX
          Position X
        • posY
          double posY
          Position Y

        • panel
          GamePanel panel

    • Class com.pacman.ui.GamePanel extends javax.swing.JPanel implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • clock
          Clock clock
          Measure time between frames. Used to keep constant speed of objects independently from FPS.
        • collectableManager
          CollectableManager collectableManager
          CollectableManager
        • gameLogic
          GameLogic gameLogic
          GameLogic
        • gameThread
          java.lang.Thread gameThread
          Thread of gameplay. GamePanel constructor creates new thread for gameplay. And the GameFrame thread, the parent of this one continues to live alongside.
        • ghostManager
          GhostManager ghostManager
          GhostManager
        • isPause
          boolean isPause
          Determines if the gameplay is paused
        • lives
          Lives lives
          Lives
        • map
          Map map
          Object representing map.
        • player
          Player player
          Object representing pac-man
        • score
          Score score
          Score
        • screenSize
          java.awt.Dimension screenSize
          Size of a screen GameFrame uses pack() method so window size is same as this one. We use it also for computing resizing graphics components.
